name: Baby Car Driving App 4 Toddler
description:
Baby Car is a fun baby driving app with lots of activity and musical treat for the little one.
Have you ever watched your little one too curious whilst you drive? Well now, you can put your little one in the driving seat using this Baby Car App!

Lots of pre-bundled children songs, sound effects and simple animation make this app a pleasant one.

Some of the activities include:

- Play Children songs in the car music player
- Press the Steering Wheel to animate with awesome sound effects
- Left and Right Indicator Lights
- Children items on the dashboard let the little mind explore and play.
- Don't forget to tap the mirror to learn the animals that are coming behind you!
- And much more!

The universal app is perfect for those with iPad whilst the iPhone version comes in handy whenever you need it.

Give it a try! You won't regret it!

Stay tuned! And please let us know if you have any suggestions for improvement
